title: 205 - AbbVie: Remarkable 700% Return Potential Over Next Decade (Dividend Sensei)
description: According to Dividend Sensei, AbbVie is the Apple of the pharma world. Thanks to a powerful pipeline and great management it has the potential to return 700% over the next 10 years.
